title: The Power Grid - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/29/22
itunes:title: The Power Grid - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/29/22
description:
George Noory and author William Forstchen discuss his efforts to protect the power grid and other communications infrastructure from destructive solar flares or intentional terrorist attacks, which could cause major disruptions to American society.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
